appDescription.message: Use [Save to MappingBird] to save places you find on any webpage.

strLoggingin.description: Status when logging in or checking login status.'

whereDescription.message: Where are you going to bookmark?
whereDescription.description: Description on the first screen to request place name or address for searching.

tryanotherDescription.message: Try another search words or use address directly.
tryanotherDescription.description: Description on the search screen after users click 'cannot find the place.'

errEmptyNameorAddress.description: Error message when Go is triggerred without providing name or address.'

strLocating.description: Status when locating a name or address.

strSearchResultTitle.description: Title on search result page after clicking on Go with name or address.'

strSearchResultDescription.description: Description on search result page after clicking on Go with name or address.'

strCannotFind.description: Label of link when users cannot find the places after searching.'

strSaveBtn.description: Label of button for saving place.'

strSaving.description: Status when saving a name or address.

strPlaceSavedStatus.description: Status when a name or address is saved.

strManagePlace.description: Label of link after place has been saved.

pholdSavedPlaceDescription.description: Placeholder of textfield for the saved place description.

strUpdateBtn.description: Label of button for updating place information.

strErrorDescription.message: We are so sorry that we might have broken something. Please try again or tell us how to help you.

strTryAgainBtn.description: Label for try again button on error page.

strFeedbackBtn.description: Label for feedback button on error page.

pholdFeedbackField.description: Placeholder of textfield for feedback field.

strSignupBtn.message: Sign up to start your collections >

tipHighlightDescription.message: Once you've found a place you want to save, highlight (text-select) the name or address of the place first.

tipClickDescription.message: After highlight the text, hit the MappingBird exntesion you just installed.

tipSaveDescription.message: After confirming which one to save from the list above, click [Save].

tipDoneDescription.message: That's it. Now you can decide whether to update tags, comments or not.
